name: Abel Vertesy's Github Page
body:
### Hello! ![Ábel](images/pics_AV/profile 2016-01-22_17.49.19.edit.small.jpg) I am [Ábel Vértesy](https://github.com/vertesy), a PhD. candidate in [Alexander van Oudenaarden's lab](http://www.hubrecht.eu/onderzoekers/vanoudenaarden) @ the [Hubrecht Institute](http://www.hubrecht.eu) in the Netherlands. I am currently working on allele specific expression in single cells, now focusing entirely on data analysis. #### *The site will be filled up with content later*




[*edit the website*](https://github.com/vertesy/vertesy.github.io/generated_pages/new)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
